text: Elsa Raven (born Elsa Rabinowitz; September 21, 1929 - November 3, 2020) was an American actress. She was born in Charleston, South Carolina. She was best known for her two years (1988–1990) on the sitcom Amen and playing the mother of Vincent Terranova on the TV series Wiseguy. She played Ida Straus in the 1997 movie Titanic and had a voice role in the 1981, animated movie American Pop. Raven retired in 2011. Raven died at her home in Los Angeles on November 3, 2020 at the age of 91.Elsa Raven Dies: ‘Save The Clock Tower’ Lady From ‘Back To The Future’ Was 91 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Charleston, South Carolina
title: Elsa Raven
